Powerful Features

Everything you need to manage your community efficiently and improve resident satisfaction.

Resident Management

Easily manage resident data, family members, and occupancy status in one secure place.

Bill Payments

Automated billing and payment tracking for maintenance fees, water, and other community charges.

Announcement System

Broadcast important news and updates to all residents instantly via mobile app and email.

Visitor Management

Secure visitor access with digital passes and real-time logging for enhanced security.

Facility Booking

Allow residents to book community facilities like halls, courts, and BBQ pits online.

Complaint Handling

Streamlined ticketing system for residents to report issues and track resolution progress.

Cara Kerja Sahabat Warga

Transformasi manajemen lingkungan Anda menjadi digital hanya dalam 4 langkah mudah.

1

Daftar Akun

Buat akun untuk RT/RW atau komunitas Anda dalam hitungan menit.

2

Import Data Warga

Upload data warga via Excel atau input manual dengan mudah.

3

Atur Tagihan

Tentukan jenis iuran (bulanan/insidentil) dan nominalnya.

4

Otomatisasi Berjalan

Tagihan terkirim otomatis via WA, dan laporan keuangan tercipta real-time.
